class.name: gd_AIS_NavigationMode
class.brief_description: Camera navigation mode enum wrapper for OpenCASCADE AIS_NavigationMode.
class.description: This class exposes the AIS_NavigationMode enum from OpenCASCADE to Godot. No methods are available; only enum values are published.

constant.name: FirstPersonFlight
constant.description: Flight rotation (first person) camera navigation mode.

constant.name: FirstPersonWalk
constant.description: Walking mode (first person) camera navigation mode.

constant.name: Lower
constant.description: Lower bound for navigation mode enum.

constant.name: Upper
constant.description: Upper bound for navigation mode enum.
